00029 class RealFunction: public RealBase {
00030     public:
00031         RealFunction (const QString &name,
00032                       double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00033                       double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00034                       double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);
00035         virtual ~RealFunction() { }
00036 
00037         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00038                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00039                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00040         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00041         virtual void Draw (void);
00042 
00043         virtual void ReInit(double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00044                             double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00045                             double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);
00046 
00047     protected:
00048         VecMath::Vector<4> &normal(double t, double u, double v);
00049 
00050         void DrawPlane (unsigned);
00051         void DrawStrip (unsigned, unsigned);
00052         void DrawCube (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00053         
00054         virtual void Initialize (void);
00055         virtual void InitMem (void);
00056 
00057         vec4vec3D X,      
00058         Xtrans; 
00059         vec3vec3D Xscr;   
00060 
00062 
00063         floatvec3D R;
00065 
00066         floatvec3D G;
00068 
00069         floatvec3D B;
00070 
00071 };

00073 
00074 /*******************************************************************************
00075  *
00076  *  classes which implement RealFunction::f (double, double, double) follow
00077  *  the descendants may also implement Function::df () and Function::normal (),
00078  *  but need not
00079  */
00080 
00082 
00084 
00092 class Hypersphere: public RealFunction {
00093     public:
00094         Hypersphere (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00095                      double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00096                      double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00097                      double _rad = 1);
00098         virtual ~Hypersphere() { }
00099         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double = 0, double = 0,
00100                                     double = 0) { Radius = _a; }
00101 
00102     protected:
00103         virtual function_type f;
00104         virtual function_type normal;
00105 
00106         double Radius;
00107 };

00117 class Torus1: public RealFunction {
00118     public:
00119         Torus1 (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00120                 double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00121                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00122                 double _R = 2, double _r = 1, double _rho = 0.5);
00123         virtual ~Torus1() { }
00124         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0,
00125                                     double _c = 0, double = 0) {
00126                                         R = _a; r = _b; rho = _c; }
00127 
00128     protected:
00129         virtual function_type f;
00130 
00131         double R, r, rho;
00132 };

00184 class GravitationPotential: public RealFunction {
00185     public:
00186         GravitationPotential (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00187                               double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00188                               double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00189                               double _M = 1, double _R = 0.25);
00190         virtual ~GravitationPotential () { }
00191         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0, double = 0, double = 0) {
00192             M = _a; R = _b;
00193         }
00194 
00195     protected:
00196         virtual function_type f;
00197 
00198         double M,               //  not really M, but M/R^3
00199         R;
00200 };
